name: .0FOP File Extension
type_name: WWE 2K Entrance or Victory Animation File
summary: Learn about .0FOP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: 0FOP files are not meant to be opened. However, some WWE 2K modders open and edit 0FOP files with hex editors, to modify the animation data they contain.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
